Title: pollen
Description: The Pollen dataset was generated from 11 populations usingmicrofluidics. The authors analyzed single-cell transcriptomesacross downsampled sequencing depths, in order to demonstratethat shallow single-cell mRNA sequencing (âˆ¼50,000 reads per cell)is sufficient for unbiased cell-type classification andbiomarker identification.

Title: darmanis
Description: The Darmanis dataset was generated using cortical tissuefrom eight adults and four embryonic samples rangingfrom 16 to 18 gestational weeks in age.

Title: kolodziejczyk
Description: The Kolodziejczyk dataset was generated using mouse EmbryonicStem Cells (mESCs) cultured in three different conditions:serum, 2i, and the alternative ground state a2i

Title: zeisel
Description: The Zeisel dataset was generated to classify cells inthe mouse somatosensory cortex and hippocampal CA1 region.The authors found 47 molecularly distinct subclasses,comprising all known major cell types in the cortex.

Title: hipsc
Description: The hiPSC dataset was generated using WTC-CRISPRi HumanInduced Pluripotent Stem Cells (hiPSCs), which are geneticallyengineered with an inducible nuclease-dead Cas9 fused to aKRAB repression domain.

Title: cellmix
Description: The Cellmix dataset was generated internally by AbbVie Inc.The dataset was generated at two different AbbVie sites usingthree Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) cell lines, bothfresh and frozen.

Title: pbmc
Description: The PBMC dataset was generated by 10x Genomics using theCell Ranger 1.1.0 pipeline. The official name of the datasetis `Fresh 68k PBMCs (Donor A)`.

Title: hca_bm
Description: The hca-bm dataset was generated by Human Cell Atlas usingbone marrow cells from eight donors.

Title: hca_cb
Description: The hca-cb dataset was generated by Human Cell Atlas usingcord blood cells
